metadata.name: RADI MIRA I LUBVI
metadata.description:
This 3D animation was produced on the basis of Evgeny Ches’ painting, which he created in the Central Market in Moscow. This project was implemented with the support of international interactive festival ARTLIFE. In 2022 5th anniversary festival took place in Manege.

In this picture you can find pins with emblems of the socio-cultural project “Radi Mira i Lubvi” packed in zip lock. Image existed for 2 months and then it was destroyed. 

Original image and idea author:
Evgeny Ches

3D animation and sound design creator:
Dmitry Tripolubov
